text:
Film Cartridge Productions, Inc.
PLANNING • PRODUCTION • PROCESSING • DISTRIBUTION
113 NORTH SAN VICENTE BLVD.
BEVERLY HILLS, CALIF. 90211
TELEPHONE: (213) 653-5086
September 20, 1965
V"
Mr. William Harley
President /
National [Association of Educational Broadcasters
1771 "N" Street, N. W.
Washington, D. C.
Dear Mr. Harley:
Film/Tape Cartridge Productions is a new company established for
the purpose of preparing Audio-Visual Programs for sales and
management training, educational, and sales presentation use.
We are most interested in obtaining information regarding your
organization and its membership. We are interested in joining
those organizations in the Audio-Visual Field whose interests
are compatible with our own.
As producers of programs for store, office, home, factory, school,
and automobile (our mobile tape cartridge library), we are anxious
to associate ourselves with people in the profession.
I am enclosing some material about our company and my own back¬
ground.
We look forward to hearing from you.
Sincerely yours,
FILM/TAPE CARTRIDGE PRODUCTIONS
Edward A. Altschuler
President
EAA/hrs
Enel.
